titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2310) to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 for the purposes of extending the authorization of appropriations for airport and airway improvements, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-321.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 178 - 235 (Record Vote No: 338).

bill.summary: 9/29/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2310 (airport development).
